name: Accommodation

name: By Car
items: A1: running from the Ruhrgebiet to Hamburg

name: By Train & Bus
items: Bus lines 16 & 17: see the route planner App. Bus lines 16 and 17 are direct lines between Osnabrück's central station and the conference venue (bus stop: Caprivistraße). At least every 10 minutes.
